name: Oh Nuts! (LEJEndary Games)
description:
Aim Of The Game

Move from side to side throwing, an ever expanding number of, falling acorns back into the air. If an acorn hits the ground you lose. If you lose you can: try or continue, working to increase one of the two high scores. 

Controls

A ~ Move left

D ~ Move right

The longer you hold a movement key the faster you'll go.

SPACE ~ Throw acorn into air. Wait until an acorn is in front of the squirrels ears or face.
